input.sentences: the bride was in her dress and ready to walk down the aisle .
so she took her father 's arm and he led her down the aisle to be married .
after the ceremony | the newly married couple excitedly trekked back down the aisle
so that they could take pictures of their first few moments as husband and wife .
then | they headed over to the reception venue for their very first dance as man and wife .
output.sentences: The woman is getting ready to be married.
Her father walks her down the aisle.
They both had a happy wedding.
The couple danced at the reception.
